dct_title_s: Carte des voyages très extraordinaires de Saturnin Farandoul : pour servir à l'intelligence du texte
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Includes text. World map illustrating the adventures of Saturnin Farandoul, which were serialized beginning in 1879 in Robida's Voyages très extraordinaires de Saturnin Farandoul, published in Paris by Librairie illustrée.
dct_publisher_sm: [Paris : Librairie illustrée?, 1879] (Sceaux : Imp. Charaire et fils)
